resources.string:
Task 1


Create a Nested Control form on the same project to add curriculum for the course in the following manner:

  •    Section 1 [Section-Name] (+)
  •    On click of the (+) icon, a sub-control should get added for adding Lecture. The sub control will have Lecture-Name and Save Button
  •    User should be allowed to add multiple lectures under same section
  •    There should be another button to add another section

Task 2


Find the missing number in the series:

    2,3,10,15,26,35,50,63,?

Implement the solution within Android in which, a text box is given along with a button. User can enter any index of the series and at the button click, the page should display the number at that entered index.


Click on Task to view solution.
Assignment – Mobile App Development on Iraitech Innovations & Technologies
Click on \'ADD NEW SECTION\' to add section
